meanings.definition: Filled with or characterized by smog.
meanings.sent1: The city looked smoggy with all the pollution in the air.
meanings.sent2: The view of the skyline was smoggy due to the haze.
meanings.sent3: The smoggy sky made it hard to see the tall buildings clearly.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt smoggy, clouded with confusion.
meanings.sent5: The smoggy atmosphere created a gloomy mood in the city.

meanings.sent1: The smoggy streets made it difficult to see far ahead.
meanings.sent2: The mountain was barely visible through the smoggy air.
meanings.sent3: The smoggy glasses made everything look blurry.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were as smoggy as the polluted city.
meanings.sent5: The smoggy horizon blended into the polluted sky.
